mapper.insert: insert into basic_user (pkid, name, loginname, password, status, createtime, registerip, lastlogintime, lastloginip, logintime, logincount, mobile, email, sex, usertype, fpinyin, spinyin,photo,profile) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{registerip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fpinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update basic_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginname = #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, registerip = #{registerip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastlogintime = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastloginip = #{lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logintime = #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, logincount = #{logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fpinyin = #{fpinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spinyin = #{spinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profile = #{profile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, name, loginname, password, status, createtime, registerip, lastlogintime, lastloginip, logintime, logincount, mobile, email, sex, usertype, fpinyin, spinyin,photo,profile from basic_user where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select pkid, name, loginname, password, status, createtime, registerip, lastlogintime, lastloginip, logintime, logincount, mobile, email, sex, usertype, fpinyin, spinyin,photo,profile from basic_user

select pkid, name, loginname, password, status, createtime, registerip, lastlogintime, lastloginip, logintime, logincount, mobile, email, sex, usertype, fpinyin, spinyin,photo,profile from basic_user WHERE loginname=#{0}

select pkid, name, loginname, password, status, createtime, registerip, lastlogintime, lastloginip, logintime, logincount, mobile, email, sex, usertype, fpinyin, spinyin,photo,profile from basic_user WHERE name=#{1} and pkid in (select userid from basic_unituser where unitid=#{0}) limit 1

select pkid, name, loginname, password, status, createtime, registerip, lastlogintime, lastloginip, logintime, logincount, mobile, email, sex, usertype, fpinyin, spinyin,photo,profile from basic_user WHERE mobile=#{0} limit 1
